channel.title: VanquishRSPS - THE Near-Reality Remake
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i1076.photobucket.com/albums/w443/SaproFX/Vanquishsplash_zpsc300227a.gif[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://i.vanquishrsps.com/bloodlust.gif[/img][/center]
[center][b]VanquishRSPS uses the actual NR source and has some of its Developer's on board, this truly is a legacy resumed. [/b] Vanquish is a brand new server based on one of the most successful private server to ever exist. The server uses the exact same source of Near Reality, with even more features added from our dedicated developers. The server has only just been released, yet has over one thousand active members and we're rapidly growing, which gives us hope that this server will soon become the number one place for Runescape Private Server fans to come and play.[/center]
[center][u]Quick Links(Not sure if I am allowed to place my forums url):[/u] [url=http://www.vanquishrsps.com/forums/]http://www.vanquishrsps.com/forums/[/url] [url=http://www.vanquishrsps.com/play/]http://www.vanquishrsps.com/play/[/url] - [u]Note that webclient is disabled for a while[/u] [url=http://vanquishrsps.com/wiki/Main_Page]http://vanquishrsps.com/wiki/Main_Page[/url][/center]
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/nM1NEtM.png[/img][/center]
[center][u]V[b]anquish is an Economy server: [/b] [/u] This basically means there's no spawning and any items people obtain will have been earned through PVM or from PKing. This means our items will have value, making everything more fun, giving players something to aim for and of course making it so much better when you finally get that kill for rare items. There are tons of different ways to exchange your items including specific market areas, clan chats, and even a dedicated section on forums. Being a new server we want to get our economy right the first time. To ensure we achieve this we have made drop rates at a perfect level to maintain item drops for PvMers, but also to give just enough that we're not flooded with items and massive inflation like you see on most other private servers.
[b][u]The Vanquish Experience:[/u][/b]
Vanquish's community is like no other! As soon as you join you will notice our active wilderness, active forums, and active PvMing and Clanning communities. Here at Vanquish RSPS, we don’t like to mess around, we want to bring you the players the best possible experience that we can give you.
Our community gives a warm welcome to all new players, and presents them with many opportunity to get involded with activities and get to know existing members. We have many events and tournaments in and out of the wilderness that makes this possible. These can be anything from Clan based PKing, to a simple games of Hide and Seek.
[u][b]The Vanquish Staff Team:[/b][/u]
All of Vanquish’s staff are hand-picked based off applications anyone is free to submit. These application then get voted on by our staff team and those few that provide the best application will get a chance to prove them selves by starting as a Server Support member. Not only do we make sure we have staff from EVERY different time zone. We make sure we have the nicest most helpful staff available for you. Many of our staff all have previous experience from other major private Server, mainly Near Reality, which means you get professional support and help when every you may need it.
[u][b]Vanquish Development & Progress:[/b][/u]
The development team here at Vanquish knows quality updates have to come from what the community wants. Once you’ve become a part of the spectacular Vanquish community, you’ll notice weekly updates, with content polls that you can vote on to bring what you want and enjoy into the game. Alternatively you can put your ideas forward as suggestions on our forums and have your voice heard and see your ideas implemented if fellow players support you.
[u][b]Vanquish Forums:[/b][/u]
Not only will you notice our active forums, you’ll notice banter ranging from the PVM section to our clan discussion to even the market place, you’ll notice an uncontrollable amount of topics and giveaways which no other RSPS can provide you. Here at Vanquish we have already accumulated over 1000+ members and are still growing at a rapid and uncontrollable pace. We also have a dedicated black market section, there to provide you with all of your buying and selling needs for non-Vanquish items. These items range from anything from guides and Runescape accounts to XBOX Live.
[u][b]Features:[/b][/u] - Flawless skills, excluding Agility and Farming - Perfect Duel Arena - Custom Barrows Minigame - Custom Vanquish PK system where you can turn in your player killing points for rewards - Friendly Staff and Active staff from all over the world - Hundreds of PVM and PVP opportunities with countless rewards - Custom Whips Including Lava and Lime whip - Perfect PKing with flawless switching and perfect hybriding - Active clans in Single and Multi - Every working special attack you can think of - Quick, Fast, Reliable auto donation system - Custom Donator Islands with lots of helpful donation perks! - Active forums - Active TeamSpeak server -Custom Wilderness teleports[/center]
[center][b][u]Media(Newest):[/u][/b][/center]
[center][img]http://i41.tinypic.com/2m41sms.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i41.tinypic.com/90zkvb.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i42.tinypic.com/351c16t.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i39.tinypic.com/21eycfo.jpg[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/6aSmU.png[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/6jtoG.png[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/6lnlh.png[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/6lnJP.png[/img]
[size=9pt][u][b]If you liked Near-Reality this is the server for you.[/b][/u][/size][/center]

item.title: VanquishRSPS - THE Near-Reality Remake
item.dc:creator: @dosez dosez
item.description:
@dosez wrote:

Beta testing for Vanquish 1 and our complete make over of the server is well underway. We want this release to be perfect so we are putting a lot of time and effort into this. Expect to see everything surface very soon, 6 months of updates packed into one brand new client with a range of updates that are sure to please all types of players. We have read the communities suggestions, we have implemented the ideas that apply to us and we are now striving for perfection.

Read full topic

item.title: VanquishRSPS - THE Near-Reality Remake
item.dc:creator: @Moo_Choco Moo Choco
item.description:
@Moo_Choco wrote:

Beta testing for Vanquish 1 (A.K.A V4) has already begun! Our developers and beta testers are pushing themselves hard to nail out every bug before Vanquish 1’s release!

As mentioned by others, Vanquish 1 is bringing a truck load of new content and improvements, make sure to have your account ready for when it is released!

Read full topic

item.description:

Make sure you dont miss it Cheesy

item.title: VanquishRSPS - THE Near-Reality Remake
item.dc:creator: @MrFun MrFun
item.description:
@MrFun wrote:

[quote=“liamp, post:11, topic:539259”][quote author=MrFun link=topic=658090.msg4414335#msg4414335 date=1395115370]

I would probably play this if you had a webclient lol, it has taken you 6+ months and you still don’t have a webclient, how hard can it really be lmao?

too be honest webclients are becoming outdated. Why you think RS has desktop client. Quick access too the game so a person has more time to play then going to through the trouble of opening the browser up
[/quote]

if you think its trouble opening up a browser and typing in … for the webclient you must be lazy :L

ot: good luck i would play if had webclient to :P[/quote]

Whats the point of a webclient? All it is a desktop client with ads surrounding it.

And yes I am lazy but I would rather just get in the game since understanding what the server has doesn’t take but an hour at max

Read full topic

item.title: VanquishRSPS - THE Near-Reality Remake
item.dc:creator: @dosez dosez
item.description:
@dosez wrote:

ohokay:

Simqly is still developing? Good luck haha, I remember him posting on R-S for help with shops back when I played.

Everyone starts somewhere, there is no shame in learning. He isn’t the lead developer anyway, we have multiple GREAT devs that are doing a fantastic job with the server. Come check it out when our newest client (V4) is released. You’ll be pleasantly surprised.

Read full topic

item.title: VanquishRSPS - THE Near-Reality Remake
item.dc:creator: @Grimrr Grimrr
item.description:
@Grimrr wrote:

I joined Vanquish about 2 Months ago, and it has been the experience of a life time. It is by far the best private server I have EVER played. The staff are amazing, thoughtful, and very helpful. The updates are frequent and very enjoyable. Join Vanquish today, and take a part in our extremely active and awesome community!

  • Grim

item.title: VanquishRSPS - THE Near-Reality Remake
item.dc:creator: @greenytheboy greenytheboy
item.description:
@greenytheboy wrote:

[center][/center]

[center][/center]

[center]VanquishRSPS uses the actual NR source and has some of its Developer’s on board, this truly is a legacy resumed.

Vanquish is a brand new server based on one of the most successful private server to ever exist. The server uses the exact same source of Near Reality, with even more features added from our dedicated developers. The server has only just been released, yet has over one thousand active members and we’re rapidly growing, which gives us hope that this server will soon become the number one place for Runescape Private Server fans to come and play.[/center]

[center]Quick Links(Not sure if I am allowed to place my forums url):
http://www.vanquishrsps.com/forums/
http://www.vanquishrsps.com/play/ - Note that webclient is disabled for a while
http://vanquishrsps.com/wiki/Main_Page[/center]

[center][/center]

[center]Vanquish is an Economy server:

This basically means there’s no spawning and any items people obtain will have been earned through PVM or from PKing. This means our items will have value, making everything more fun, giving players something to aim for and of course making it so much better when you finally get that kill for rare items. There are tons of different ways to exchange your items including specific market areas, clan chats, and even a dedicated section on forums. Being a new server we want to get our economy right the first time. To ensure we achieve this we have made drop rates at a perfect level to maintain item drops for PvMers, but also to give just enough that we’re not flooded with items and massive inflation like you see on most other private servers.

The Vanquish Experience:

Vanquish’s community is like no other! As soon as you join you will notice our active wilderness, active forums, and active PvMing and Clanning communities. Here at Vanquish RSPS, we don’t like to mess around, we want to bring you the players the best possible experience that we can give you.

Our community gives a warm welcome to all new players, and presents them with many opportunity to get involded with activities and get to know existing members. We have many events and tournaments in and out of the wilderness that makes this possible. These can be anything from Clan based PKing, to a simple games of Hide and Seek.

The Vanquish Staff Team:

All of Vanquish’s staff are hand-picked based off applications anyone is free to submit. These application then get voted on by our staff team and those few that provide the best application will get a chance to prove them selves by starting as a Server Support member. Not only do we make sure we have staff from EVERY different time zone. We make sure we have the nicest most helpful staff available for you. Many of our staff all have previous experience from other major private Server, mainly Near Reality, which means you get professional support and help when every you may need it.

Vanquish Development & Progress:

The development team here at Vanquish knows quality updates have to come from what the community wants. Once you’ve become a part of the spectacular Vanquish community, you’ll notice weekly updates, with content polls that you can vote on to bring what you want and enjoy into the game. Alternatively you can put your ideas forward as suggestions on our forums and have your voice heard and see your ideas implemented if fellow players support you.

Vanquish Forums:

Not only will you notice our active forums, you’ll notice banter ranging from the PVM section to our clan discussion to even the market place, you’ll notice an uncontrollable amount of topics and giveaways which no other RSPS can provide you. Here at Vanquish we have already accumulated over 1000+ members and are still growing at a rapid and uncontrollable pace. We also have a dedicated black market section, there to provide you with all of your buying and selling needs for non-Vanquish items. These items range from anything from guides and Runescape accounts to XBOX Live.

Features:

  • Flawless skills, excluding Agility and Farming
  • Perfect Duel Arena
  • Custom Barrows Minigame
  • Custom Vanquish PK system where you can turn in your player killing points for rewards
  • Friendly Staff and Active staff from all over the world
  • Hundreds of PVM and PVP opportunities with countless rewards
  • Custom Whips Including Lava and Lime whip
  • Perfect PKing with flawless switching and perfect hybriding
  • Active clans in Single and Multi
  • Every working special attack you can think of
  • Quick, Fast, Reliable auto donation system
  • Custom Donator Islands with lots of helpful donation perks!
  • Active forums
  • Active TeamSpeak server
    -Custom Wilderness teleports[/center]

[center]Media(Newest):[/center]

[center]

[size=9pt]If you liked Near-Reality this is the server for you.[/size][/center]

Read full topic
